Program a FPGA
Replicate all the labs demonstrated in this lab

items.headline: Go past the basics and explore some of the most exciting features and capabilities of your drone
objectives_summary: Improve the features of your FlySky radio controller so that you can take full advantage of the hardware.
Set up radio telemetry between your computer and the drone so that you can track and control your drone from your computer in real time.
Configure fail-safes to prevent avoidable injuries and damage to your drone.

items.title: Learn Siemens S7-300 PLC, Simatic Manager Step 7 & WinCC HMI
items.headline: Learn Siemens Simatic Manager Step 7 v5,5, S7-300 PLC & WinCC Flexible HMI with Ladder logic, FBD & STL [English]
objectives_summary: Students will Learn PLC Hardware, Wiring and Communication with Siemens S7-300
Students will learn Siemens Simatic Manager PLC Software from Scratch and practice programming concepts
Students will learn interfacing S7-300 PLC with PC through MPI Interface

Microcontroller Architecture (8-bit AVR)
Bare-metal Microcontroller Programming

items.title: Learn PLC basics EASY!
items.headline: Enter the world of industrial automation with this introductory course to Programmable Logic Controllers
objectives_summary: Understand and select a basic PLC hardware configuration in a typical industrial system
Understand the basic software elements that a PLC uses in industrial automation
Identify and select the best PLC programming language for an automation project.

items.title: Digital Signal Processing(DSP) From Ground Up™ using Arduino
items.headline: Practical DSP on Arduino :  FFT, Filter Design, Convolution, IIR, FIR, Hamming Window, Linear Systems,
objectives_summary: Develop and test  the Convolution Kernel algorithm on Arduino
Develop  and test the Discrete Fourier Transform (DFT) algorithm on Arduino
Develop and test the Inverse Discrete Fourier Transform (IDFT) on Arduino

items.title: Raspberry Pi meets Arduino
items.headline: Learn how Raspberry Pi can communicate with Arduino. Also included RFID using Arduino
objectives_summary: Communicate a message between the Arduino and Raspberry Pi and Vice versa
Learn how RFID works and Find out what the future holds for RFID technology
Employee entry system using Arduino and RFID sensor

items.title: How to Build an Extreme Gaming PC!
items.headline: A comprehensive guide to Building Your 1st Gaming PC - Step-by-Step for Beginner's.
objectives_summary: How to Research a gaming PC Build.
Asus ROG Maximus XI Hero Motherboard full installation.
Install Intel i9-9900K Processor.

items.title: Node-RED and ESP32 Project

visible_instructors.title: Dr. Peter Dalmaris
visible_instructors.name: Dr. Peter
visible_instructors.job_title: Educator and Author of "Maker Education Revolution".

items.headline: Design and build an automated control system using Node-RED and the ESP32
objectives_summary: Node-RED, the lightweight graphical programming tool.
ESP32, the powerful low-cost microcontroller with Wifi that you can program with the Arduino IDE.
MQTT Mosquitto broker, for reliable messaging between the ESP32 and Node-RED.

items.title: PLC Advanced ST/SCL, No More Ladder Logic Spaghetti Code
items.headline: Master Structured Text (ST, SCL) and PLC pattern Based and Component based Software design
objectives_summary: Pattern based PLC programming
Structured Coding
PLC Structured Text and CFC Programming Languages

items.title: MicroPython for everyone using ESP32 / ESP8266 (Beginner)
items.headline: Kick-start to MicroPython . You will learn the basics of MicroPython from Blink an LED to MultiTreading & WiFi connect
objectives_summary: Kick-start to MicroPython using ESP32 / ESP8266
Coding and flashing using Thonny IDE
Multi-threading with ESP32

items.title: Bitcoin Mining using Raspberry Pi
items.headline: Get up and running with Bitcoin Mining in no time
objectives_summary: Understand all the concepts related to bitcoin mining.
Implement bitcoin mining using a Raspberry Pi.

items.title: PLC Programming From Scratch To Advance
items.headline: This course will make you from zero to hero in S7-PLC programming. No prior software or hardware skills required.
objectives_summary: After completing this course, you will be able to make your own logic and create a PLC program from scratch.
The primary objective of this course is to give an understanding of PLC programming and standard HMI (Human-Machine Interface).
Students will able to make variety of ladder logic according to different environments.

visible_instructors.name: Sanjay
visible_instructors.job_title: CEO at RFIC Solutions, Alumni IIT Bombay

items.headline: Design your own RF circuit by conceptualizing the amazing concepts and enhancing great skills of RF circuit design.
objectives_summary: Get a brief overview of of what RF Design is all about and why it is so essential. You will get to know whether you should pursue a career in RF Design or not.
